description: This table contains information about BMT anonymous donors.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the BMT anonymous donor.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_2_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: BIRTH_DATE
columns.description: The date of birth of the BMT donor.

columns.name: SEX_ASGN_AT_BIRTH_C_NAME
columns.description:
The BMT donor's sex assigned at birth.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Unknown


Not recorded on birth certificate


Choose not to disclose


Uncertain
